title: Trump’s travel ban leaves global businesses and entrepreneurs hanging
text: In Eslami's case, he has found himself stranded overseas away from his business. The Department of Homeland Security said Sunday that green card holders from the seven Muslim-majority countries affected by the order would be able to reenter the country, but the rushed implementation has left many with a sense of uncertainty about whether they will be turned away at the border.
summary:
In Eslami's case, he has found himself stranded overseas away from his business.
The Department of Homeland Security said Sunday that green card holders from the seven Muslim-majority countries affected by the order would be able to reenter the country, but the rushed implementation has left many with a sense of uncertainty about whether they will be turned away at the border.
